template_info.name: Hyper Offense Meta
template_info.description: An ultra-aggressive competitive team focused on overwhelming opponents with relentless offensive pressure
template_info.usage_notes: This team aims to KO opponents before they can respond. Every Pokemon is designed for maximum damage output. Requires precise prediction and timing.

pokemon.name: mewtwo
pokemon.strategy: Ultimate special attacker with perfect neutral coverage
pokemon.tips: Lead with this to immediately threaten huge damage on any target

pokemon.name: dragonite
pokemon.strategy: Priority-based physical sweeper with excellent coverage
pokemon.tips: Extreme Speed bypasses speed tiers to finish weakened opponents

pokemon.name: alakazam
pokemon.strategy: Extreme special attack with diverse coverage options
pokemon.tips: Often outspeeds and OHKOs threats before they can move

pokemon.name: jolteon
pokemon.strategy: Fastest team member for immediate speed control
pokemon.tips: Use this to outspeed and revenge kill opposing fast threats

pokemon.name: charizard
pokemon.strategy: Mixed attacker that breaks through defensive cores
pokemon.tips: Solar Beam surprise covers water/ground/rock counters

pokemon.name: gyarados
pokemon.strategy: Late-game setup sweeper with intimidate support
pokemon.tips: Dragon Dance once safely, then attempt to sweep entire team
